content: Created `pyproject.toml` with PEP 621 metadata, `jsonschema` as a runtime dependency, `src/`-layout packaging config, and a `qg-bench` console script entry point wired to `qg_bench.runner:main`.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=69", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta\""",
"""[project]
name = "qg-bench"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Tiny benchmark runner with JSON Schema validation for question-generation style datasets."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.9"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "OpenAI", email = "noreply@openai.com"}]
dependencies = ["jsonschema>=4.18"]""",
"""[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://example.invalid/qg-bench\""",
"""[project.scripts]
qg-bench = "qg_bench.runner:main\""",
"""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = {"" = "src\""" ,
"""[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["src"]""",
"""[tool.setuptools.package-data]
qg_bench = ["schemas/*.json"]"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=69", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta\"""".replace('\\"','"'),  # safeguard
"""[project]
name = "qg-bench"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Tiny benchmark runner with JSON Schema validation for question-generation style datasets."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.9"
license = { text = "MIT" }
authors = [{ name = "OpenAI", email = "noreply@openai.com" }]
dependencies = ["jsonschema>=4.18"]""",
"""[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://example.invalid/qg-bench\"""".replace('\\"','"'),
"""[project.scripts]
qg-bench = "qg_bench.runner:main\"""".replace('\\"','"'),
"""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = { "" = "src" }""",
"""[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["src"]""",
"""[tool.setuptools.package-data]
qg_bench = ["schemas/*.json"]""",
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created `pyproject.toml` with PEP 621 metadata, `jsonschema` as a runtime dependency, `src/`-layout packaging config, and a `qg-bench` console script entry point wired to `qg_bench.runner:main`.
